= Introduktion =

=Installationsanvisning=

==Ladda ner applikationen==

{{{
wget https://skltpservices.googlecode.com/files/FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0.zip
}}}

==Installera applikationen== 

* Ta bort tidigare installation av applikationen

{{{
tail -f /usr/local/mule-standalone-3.3.1/logs/mule.log
rm /usr/local/mule-standalone-3.3.1/apps/FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0-anchor.txt
}}}

* Driftsätt applikationen

{{{
tail -f /usr/local/mule-standalone-3.3.1/logs/mule.log
cp FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0.zip /usr/local/mule-standalone-3.3.1/apps/
}}}

* Verifiera driftsättningen

I /usr/local/mule-standalone-3.3.1/logs/mule.log skall följande dyka upp vid en lyckad driftsättning

{{{
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
+ New app 'FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0'                              +
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
INFO  2013-08-28 08:50:27,837 [WrapperListener_start_runner] org.mule.module.launcher.MuleApplicationClassLoader: [FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0] Loading the following jars:
=============================
-
-
-
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
+ Started app 'FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0'                          +
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
**********************************************************************
*            - - + APPLICATION + - -            * - - + STATUS + - - *
**********************************************************************
* FkEintygAdapterIC-2.0.0                             * DEPLOYED           *
**********************************************************************
}}}

Gör ett anrop till tjänsten monitor/ping och verifiera resultatet

{{{
curl -i http://localhost:8080/fk/Ping/1/rivtabp20

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: text/xml; charset=UTF-8
Date: Thu, 12 Sep 2013 01:16:46 CEST
Server: Mule Core/3.3.1
X-MULE_ENCODING: UTF-8
X-MULE_CORRELATION_ID: cf76bc4f-1b9c-11e3-a2ff-e1e20e3f2501
X-MULE_CORRELATION_GROUP_SIZE: 1
X-MULE_CORRELATION_SEQUENCE: -1
Content-Length: 12

Anslutningstjansten Forsakringskassan OK!
}}}
